summary: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.
cast: Hye-ja Kim|Won Bin|Jin Goo|Je-mun Yun|Mi-seon Jeon|Sae-byeok Song|Byoung-Soon Kim|Woo-hee Chun|Gin-goo Kim|Moo-yeong Yeo|Young-Suck Lee|Hee-ra Mun|Mi-do Lee|Young-ki Jung|Go Gyu-Pil|Hong-jib Kim|Kyung-suk Min|Kyung-Sook Cho|Myung-shin Park|Young-gil Yoon|Byeong-gil Kwon|Beom-Taek Kwon|Deok-seong Ha|Dong-hun Lin|Jeong-eun Lee|Byeong-ah Im|Hwang Young-Hee|Mi-jun Kim|Kyung-yeun Hong|Tae-won Kim|Chris Briscoe|Pil-Kyeong Jang|Moon-Eui Jo|Jeong-wuk Kim|Seung-Hyun Lee|Yeong-seok Lee|Bok-dong Mun|Dong-hun Yum|Hyeon-ju Lee|Ok-ju Lee
title: Mother
